summary: A British lady entomologist travels to a Balkan country to look into germ warfare trials using various bugs as carriers.
cast: Margaret Lockwood|Dane Clark|Marius Goring|Naunton Wayne|Wilfrid Hyde-White|Eugene Deckers|Olaf Pooley|Gladys Henson|Paul Hardtmuth|Michael Hordern|George Benson|Eric Pohlmann|John Horsley|Patric Doonan|Joan Haythorne|Jill Balcon|Hyma Beckley|John Boxer|Daniel Brown|Ernest Butcher|Robert Cawdron|Anton Diffring|Toni Frost|John Gabriel|Philo Hauser|John G. Heller|Noel Johnson|Sam Kydd|Richard Marner|Louis Matto|Anthony Newley|Michael Rittermann|Lance Secretan|Dinah Sheridan|Ewen Solon|Emile Stemmler|Robert Vossler|John Wilder
director: Director: Roy Ward Baker (as Roy Baker)
title: Armas secretas
